Class Dreieck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Form
      • MultipointForm
        • Dreieck

  • public class Dreieck
extends MultipointForm
    A Dreieck is a form with three points ('Punkte'). A Dreieck is a triangle.
    Author:
    Philippe Krüttli
